text: Reinhard Zerfowski (born 3 November 1947) is a German rower who represented East Germany. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City with the men's eight where they came seventh. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of East Germany Category:Rowers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Berlin
title: Reinhard Zerfowski
